welcome_message_body: "Welcome to the charming city of Worsley, known for its beautiful canals and historic landmarks. We hope you have a delightful stay and take some time to explore all that this charming city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for low-cost airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A newly built terminal for long-haul flights.

wifi.note: Limited free access, premium options available for purchase.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Charter Terminal
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport, dedicated to charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Warton Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Warton Airport, handling freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the WiFi network for free by selecting the network name and following the prompts.
